pages.title: Lodestone Turbine
pages.text: The <item>Lodestone Turbine/$ produces <thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/rotary)rotary power/$ for free constantly. It only works in dimensions where clocks and compasses spin uselessly (like the nether and end), by harnessing the large fluctuating magnetic fields that disrupt these devices.$(br2)It connect axially
on the top, and can not raise the speed above 10 rad/s.$(br2)

<bobo>limitted POWAH! uNLIMITID eNErGY! i AM THE $(l:crossroads:intro/welcome#bobo)BOBO!/$<bobo> i haz be113r verzun!$(br2)<bobo>watz broun und schtick-y?$(br2)<bobo>oRANGE ti3m nUGG-NUGG!$(br2)<bobo>dA ME3NING uv lI3F! ThA MANY-VERSE! &nd EVERYTING! butt on MEET nUGG-nUGG!/$$(br2)
